name: GameZero
description: Two castles defend their keep against invaders, defend them and hone your skills in the arena to gain weapons and armor, and conquer greater foes!  An online mmo experience, GameZero uses ummorpg and unity partnered with steam to provide an immersive online experience.  Over 15 sets of armor to acquire and 50 weapons to increase your potential on the battlefield!  Play online with friends or build a server yourself and host for others.
